ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
ygData.msgSnippet: The spot is an 18 min spawn (like most of them in Upper Guk).  Scryer shows up about every 4 th or 5th time iirc. Woven grass is the common, shimmering orb is
ygData.messageBody:
The spot is an 18 min spawn (like most of them in Upper Guk). Scryer shows
up about every 4 th or 5th time iirc. Woven grass is the common, shimmering
orb is uncommon (1 in 10???). Easy enough to camp Scryer and Warden (elf
hide gloves & troll hide belt) and scryer. Squire too - if you can find his
spot (i dont know him was well).

Sylly.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 10:48 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....


> I've never even seen the Scryer, except one time as a corpse when I was
> exploring as a youngin. The few times I have been in the room talking to
> campers he hasn't ever popped. How rare a spawn is he? Always wanted one
> of them glowing shield thingees, just never could justify the cost. Now
if
> I could just get John to quantify the damage reduction one would see by
> raising their AC by 5-6%...
>
> Kit

run

who
